metadata.title: New Kanji Titanium Ring "Good Fortune - Luck" Bands, Kanji Rings
description: This is a comfort fit "Kanji Good Fortune & Luck" band that is custom made to order with Aerospace Grade Titanium! A Polish finish gives this ring the perfect finishing touch! This rings quality is unmatched! We also have a satisfaction guarantee!
